about_the_game:
🎩🍻 Beer and Rush: Non-Vr Edition is a short game inspired by a real-life experience: after a few beers, I dreamed of desperately searching for a bathroom. Beer barrels chased me, I kept falling, and my friends couldn't stop laughing.

Check out the non-VR version of the original 'Beer and Rush VR,' also on Steam!

Strap in for a pee-rific adventure:

  • 🌌🚽 Get lost in the dreams as you search for the relief station—a.k.a. the bathroom.

  • 🕯️🎸 Light up the night with lanterns in your virtual hands.

  • 🎶🌙 Jump through a moonlit level accompanied by Clair de Lune.

  • 🎵🍺 And yes, you'll actually hear Clair de Lune and Gymnopédies as you make that "one small leap for man, but a giant sip for mankind."

  • 🎩🎶Enjoy our original soundtrack featuring rock and funk.

Embark on a surreal, beer-induced adventure that blurs the boundaries of dreams and reality!!! 🎵🍻

movies.name: Beer and Rush - Non VR Trailler

name: Beer and Rush: Non-VR Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740 (2048 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 5770 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Experience the hilarious 360º platformer, 'Beer and Rush: Non-VR Edition', where you must find a bathroom in a dream world after having a few beers. Based on a personal experience, this short game is a platformer packed with humor, great music, and challenges.
